hackathon-description-text: Building on the success of the first Stamford Hackathon in Sept. 2015, the Stamford Innovation Center is proud to host and support the second Bi-Annual Stamford Hackathon, on February 19-21st

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Director of Economic Development, Stamford CT

hackathon-eligibility: Anyone that wants to join, is absolutely welcome to join. Only those that physically are at the hackathon are eligible for prizes.
hackathon-rules:
Our hackathon will not have special libraries or other reasons for restrictions. We will instead rely on the honor code.
Any and all IP created at this hackathon is not owned or involving the Stamford Innovation Center, the Shippan Institute, or any of our sponsors.
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=175 Atlantic St, Stamford, CT 06901, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
How well did you use the software & tools available
How well did your project perform?
How well does your project advance the idea of "smart cities"

hackathon-description-header: Stamford's second Hackathon: Come hack the IoT Corridor and World-Class AI!
